Why: Somos una desconexión de la vida diaria para los apasionados de la libertad.
Planificamos las experiencias y aventuras por y para ti.
Why2: Te Ofrecemos un servicio personalizado y de calidad.
Te guiamos en tús vacaciones para que no tengas preocupaciones.

Services.name: Camper Van Rental
Services.text: If you prefer, you can rent our Camper Van only. Rest assured, it will include all the basics and necessities for you to fully enjoy your days.

Services.name: We Plan Your Experiences
Services.text: If you want us to plan the adventures you want to experience, we will make reservations for activities and guide you in everything you need.

Services.name: Water Activities
Services.text: We offer various kits that you can customize to your liking for enjoying water experiences such as kayaking, paddleboarding, beach rackets, snorkeling, among others.

Services.name: Bike Rental
Services.text: You can rent bikes with us for leisurely rides or mountain biking. We can also offer you a voucher to use city bikes.

Services.name: Pet Friendly
Services.text: You can enjoy special moments with your pet; they are always welcome.

Services.name: Special Moments
Services.text: We offer to plan and provide you with what you need to create a picnic for your special occasions.
